data.title: the iconic journal of a nostalgia-obsessed bimbo
meta_keywords: the iconic journal of a nostalgia-obsessed bimbo
data.meta_description: the internet is so boring and corpor8, i'm using livejournal and other retro 2000s website revivals as an escape from the black hole that is modern social media.
data.text:
all the songs played in the city

ever since i listed all the songs that were played in laguna beach and the hills, i figured that in order 2 close off the liz gateley/adam divello trilogy, i would list all of the songs that were played in the og airings of the spin-off 2 the hills titled the city (2008-2010), which starred whitney port, who previously starred on the hills up until the conclusion of the 4th szn of the show.

so, much like i did laguna beach and its original soundtrack from the og airings c. 2004-2006, and the hills and its original soundtrack from the og airings c. 2006-2010, i'm going 2 b doing the same thing w the city. like laguna beach and the hills, i'm going 2 list all the songs that were played in the og airings of the city c. 2008-2010, both szns.

like b4, this will include most (if not all) of the songs from the og airings of the series, so if i missed any songs, like always, feel free 2 lmk!! but anyway, let's start.

all the songs played in the hills

a couple weeks ago, i made a post listing all the songs that were featured in all 3 szns of laguna beach: the real orange county. bc we're living in this current era of streaming services, a lot of iconic shows from the 1990s and 2000s had their original soundtracks removed bc these network companies didn't license the music 2 keep them in their shows, and i think that's just a bunch of bs as well as a massive injustice. many iconic scenes don't feel the same w/o the original music playing, and the tones of those scenes change bc of that.

so, just like i did w laguna beach and its original soundtrack from the og airings c. 2004-2006, i thought i'd do the same thing 4 its spin-off, the hills. like laguna beach, i'm going 2 b listing all the songs that were played in the og airings of the hills c. 2006-2010, all 6 szns.

this list will include most (if not all) of the songs that were featured in the og airings of the series, so if i missed any songs, like always, feel free 2 lmk!! anyway, let's get it started.

all the songs played in laguna beach: the real orange county

if u grew up during the mid-2000s, u probably remember watching mtv reality shows like laguna beach: the real orange county (2004-2006) or the hills (2006-2010). u probably also remember the songs that were played throughout the episodes. well, i recently came across this tweet:

https://twitter.com/pcd2009/status/1216226349846814720

and i wondered, since mtv didn't license the original soundtrack 4 any of their hit 2000s shows, and basically destroyed the most iconic scenes of their shows bc of this, i thought that i'd make a list of all the songs from the original airings of laguna beach from 2004-2006, all 3 szns.

this will include most (if not all) of the songs from the og airings of the series, so if i missed any songs, feel free 2 lmk!! but anyway, let's start.

upd8 (2/18/23): i have included the songs that were played in newport harbor: the real orange county (2007), which aired as a successor 2 laguna beach 2 avoid canceling the series 4 lack of a 4th szn plotline. unfortunately, due 2 the lackluster r8ings, newport harbor was canceled after 12 episodes. anyway, i included the songs from newport harbor bc y the hell not, even if newport harbor doesn't rlly have any connections 2 the og laguna beach (hell, even the 3rd szn of the show) other than the formatting and styling of the show. plus, by the time newport harbor aired, laguna beach's spinoff, the hills, had just aired their 3rd szn, and was already becoming a pop cultural phenomenon after certain cast members were making headlines in tabloid magazines and gossip blogs bc of their respective controversies and scandals.
